publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4673 Mr David Davidson: Aberdeen International Youth Festival - The World Festival of Youth Arts, 2 - 12 August 2006â€”That the Parliament welcomes the 2006 Aberdeen International Youth Festival which takes place between 2 and 12 August 2006; recognises the importance of this bringing together of young people from across the world in this vibrant, international event which showcases talent from Scotland and around the world; wishes all involved a successful and enjoyable festival, and further welcomes the contribution the event makes to the economy of Aberdeen and the surrounding area. Supported by: Christine Grahame*, Brian Adam*, Fiona Hyslop*, Nora Radcliffe*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Fergus Ewing*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Dennis Canavan*, John Swinburne*, Dave Petrie*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Frances Curran* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-4673 Aberdeen International Youth Festival - The World Festival of Youth Arts, 2 - 12 August 2006 (lodged on 24 July 2006) Robin Harper*, Eleanor Scott*, Ms Maureen Watt*
S2M-4673 Aberdeen International Youth Festival - The World Festival of Youth Arts, 2 - 12 August 2006 (lodged on 24 July 2006) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
